parsing_result:
# FTP Optional Setting

Adjust settings for FTP upload.

## Select Image & Transfer
Mark picture for upload (see page 288).

## Auto Image Transfer Order
Select **ON** to automatically mark pictures for upload as they are taken.

| Options |        |
|---------|--------|
| ON      | OFF    |

## Select File Type
Choose the types of files uploaded to the FTP server. You can select or deselect each file type individually.

| Options |        |      |      |     |     |
|---------|--------|------|------|-----|-----|
| JPEG    | RAW    | HEIF | TIFF | MOV | MP4 |

## Caption for FTP Transfer
Add captions to photos and movies during upload.

| Option           | Description                                                                 |
|------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| DEFAULT CAPTION  | Add the caption selected for **SAVE DATA SETTING > DEFAULT CAPTION**.       |
| CREATED CAPTION  | Create new captions or select existing captions.                            |
| NO CAPTION       | Do not add captions to pictures during upload.                              |

## Transfer/Suspend
Pause or resume FTP upload.

| Options  |          |
|----------|----------|
| TRANSFER | SUSPEND  |
